Base64Pipe
BasicPipesTranslator
Pipe that performs base64 encoding and decoding.
See also
Github - Base64Pipe Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.pipes.Base64Pipe
Syntax
Copy
<Base64Pipe name=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
The functional name of this pipe. It can be referenced by the path attribute of a PipeForward.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
direction	options	ENCODE
Available Options: ENCODE, DECODE
charset	text	-
Character encoding to be used when reading input from strings for direction = encode or writing data for direction = decode.
lineSeparator	text	auto
(Only used when direction=encode) Defines the separator between lines. Special values: auto: platform default, dos: crlf, unix: lf.
